title: Google fixes fifth actively exploited Chrome zero-day of 2023
description: Google has patched the fifth Chrome zero-day vulnerability exploited in attacks since the start of the year in emergency security updates released today. [...]

title: SSH keys stolen by stream of malicious PyPI and npm packages
description: A stream of malicious npm and PyPi packages have been found stealing a wide range of sensitive data from software developers on the platforms. [...]

title: Fake Bitwarden sites push new ZenRAT password-stealing malware
description: Fake Bitwarden sites are pushing installers purportedly for the open-source password manager that carry a new password-stealing malware that security researchers call ZenRAT. [...]

title: Building automation giant Johnson Controls hit by ransomware attack
description: Johnson Controls International has suffered what is described as a massive ransomware attack that encrypted many of the company devices, including VMware ESXi servers, impacting the company's and its subsidiaries' operations. [...]

title: Microsoft now rolling out AI-powered Paint Cocreator to Insiders
description: Microsoft's new AI image generation Paint tool powered by OpenAI's DALL-E text-to-image model is now rolling out to Windows Insiders in Dev and Canary channels. [...]

title: US and Japan warn of Chinese hackers backdooring Cisco routers
description: A joint cybersecurity advisory by the FBI, NSA, CISA, and the Japanese NISC (cybersecurity) and NPA (police) sheds light on the techniques the Chinese threat actors known as BlackTech use to attack Japanese and U.S. organizations. [...]

title: Modern GPUs vulnerable to new GPU.zip side-channel attack
description: Researchers from four American universities have developed a new GPU side-channel attack that leverages data compression to leak sensitive visual data from modern graphics cards when visiting web pages. [...]

title: GitHub repos bombarded by info-stealing commits masked as Dependabot
description: Hackers are breaching GitHub accounts and inserting malicious code disguised as Dependabot contributions to steal authentication secrets and passwords from developers. [...]
